title: LI 6 - Other Licensees
content:
LI 6 - Other Licensees

State Regulations
§ LI 6.1 - Insurance charges by licensed lenders
§ LI 6.2 - Time of payment of service charge on premium advanced by insurance premium finance agency
§ LI 6.3 - Preemption of part of banking law, section 352(b) by the federal equal credit opportunity act
§ LI 6.4 - Preemption of part of banking law section 352(e) by section 2125(c) of the vehicle and traffic law

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
